name: POKKO
description:
POKKO is our entry for Ludum Dare 47, whose theme was "Stuck in a loop".

You control a boy who is stuck in a Game Boy game. When you collect a Game Boy, a clone of you gets spawned, who repeats your past actions. You need to use him to solve the puzzles.

Additional controls

"R" restarts the level

Left Shift + E passes the level
